title: Title insurance for international transactions
dataVerified: Property owner, country, title insurer, coverage amount, jurisdictional risks
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Prevents fake international title insurance. Domain binding verifies global title insurer (First American, Stewart Title). Cross-border real estate. Complex jurisdictional issues. Permanent ownership records. Multi-million dollar transactions.
